name: DBFH 2XX8
description:
For the Desert Bus For Hope 2018 game jam.  The all important fart sponge has... Broken?  Been possessed?  Something's not right with it.  Enter the chair's inner landscape and do something about it!

It's an RPGmaker game so, arrow keys to move, Z/spacebar to interact, and X for cancel/menu.

(PS: I still don't know who any LRR people are.)
